title: ERROR_VALUE
description: Returns the substitute value if evaluating the value results in an error; otherwise, returns the original value.

parameters.name: substitute_value
parameters.description: The value to return if the evaluation of "value" results in an error.

examples:
ERROR_VALUE(CloseDate - TODAY(), 0)
-- Returns the days between CloseDate and today; returns 0 if the calculation errors (e.g., CloseDate is NULL).

tips.text: Use ERROR_VALUE to  prevent formula errors from invalid calculations or missing data.
Ensure value and substitute_value are of the same data type.
